column5: GOT OUT AT 4AM THIS MORN EXPECTING A GOOD DAY OF BASS FISHIN!!! CONS WERE PERFECT!!! LITTLE DRIZZLE IN THE MORN AND CLOUD COVER TILL THE AFT!!! HIT ALL THE SAME SPOTS AS THE OTHER DAY AND COULD ONLY FIND 1 BASS!!! NEVER CAUGHT A CRAPPIE BEFORE AND MANAGED 2 TODAY!!! A PRETTY BIG SLAB THE LAST PIC IS TOO!!!      NICE SLAB
Congrats CC. It figures your first one would be a monster. WTG!
Congrats on your new species! I've been wanting to catch a crappie since this spring. Wanna try one out in the frying pan. Those 2 crappies would make a good meal with fries on the side!!!
Wow...two reports so close together?  This is surely a treat...LOL.  Great job Scott...good to see you out there doing some catchin!  How'd the move go?

TX GUYZ!!! MOVE WENT GOOD TX BRO!!! MIGHT BE A FEW MORE REPORTS IF I DONT GET BACK TO WORK SOON!!! WORKED 3 WEEKS AND LAID OFF AT THE BEGINNING OF CONSTRUCTION SEASON!!! NEVER HEARD OF IT IN MY LIFE!!! GUESS THATS WHAT HAPPENS WHEN YOUR LAST NAME DONT END IN A VOWEL  LOL ( SO I WAS TOLD ) BEEN SUPER LUCKY TO GET OUT!!! BASS FISHIN LILIES IS ADDICTIVE!!!LOL(MY WIFE AINT GONNA WANNA HEAR THAT  LOL) HOPE CAROL AND THE KIDS ARE DOIN WELL!!!

Doing well Scott.....missing the bows though!!  Glad that you are able to get out vs sitting around the house and nice to see you returning to your roots in bass fishing  lol   Nice looking fish and congrats on the crappie!!
